settings.title: Settings
settings.loki_retention_helper: Days to keep logs in Loki
settings.prometheus_retention_helper: Days to keep metrics in Prometheus and Timescale
settings.prometheus_retention_tooltip: Timescale is a time-series database used to store metrics. It is used by the controller to store and aggregate additional metrics on top of the metrics provided by Prometheus.
settings.cn_helper: The name of the controller, used to create the VPN certification authority
settings.network_helper: The VPN network used to connect the units to the controller.
settings.user_helper: This is the only user that can create and manage other users inside the controller
settings.user_tooltip: The username grants access to the controller user interface and also to Grafana. Once configured, it cannot be changed
settings.password_helper: The administrator password can be set only during first configuration
settings.password_tooltip: The password grants access both to the controller user interface and also to Grafana. For security reasons, you should change it after first login
settings.host_helper: The FQDN of the controller, it must be reachable from the units
settings.cn_tooltip: The field will be read-only after the first configuration
settings.network_tooltip: Make sure this network does not overlap with the units' networks. The field will be read-only after the first configuration
settings.netmask_tooltip: Do not change this value unless you know what you are doing. The field will be read-only after the first configuration
settings.netmask_helper: The netmask determines the size of the VPN network. Use only class C networks
settings.password_placeholder: Password can be modified from the controller webapp
settings.password_information_description: The default administrator password is displayed only once, please store it in a safe place
settings.vpn_port_description: Units will connect to controller using a VPN connection. Make sure the units can reach the controller on UDP port {port}
settings.maxmind_license_helper: The license key is required to use the MaxMind GeoIP2 database
settings.maxmind_license_tooltip: Enable IP geolocations inside Grafana dashboards
settings.allowed_ips_helper: One IPv4 or CIDR per line. Leave empty to allow all IPs
settings.allowed_ips_tooltip: Required unit version: 8.6 or above. This field is used to restrict the access to the controller. When the access is restricted, units will contact the public register endpoint, then all traffic will go through the VPN.
settings.tun_mtu_helper: Maximum Transmission Unit for the VPN TUN interface
settings.tun_mtu_tooltip: Lower this value if you experience connectivity issues with units
settings.mssfix_helper: Maximum Segment Size fix for the VPN connections
settings.mssfix_tooltip: Change only if you have troubles connecting to units

error.invalid_cn: Invalid controller name: it must contain only letters and numbers
error.invalid_user: Invalid user name: it must contain only letters and numbers
error.invalid_host: Invalid host name: it must be a valid FQDN
error.prometheus_rention_max: Metrics retention must be less than 365 days
error.prometheus_rention_min: Metrics retention must be greater than 1 day
error.loki_retention_max: Logs retention must be less than 365 days
error.loki_retention_min: Logs retention must be greater than 1 day
error.invalid_network: Invalid network, it mus be a class C network like 192.168.200.0
error.invalid_netmask: Invalid netmask, it must be a valid netmask like 255.255.255.0
error.invalid_allowed_ips: Invalid allowed IPs, each entry must be a and IP or CIDR network.
error.tun_mtu_min: TUN MTU must be at least 576
error.mssfix_min: MSS Fix must be at least 0
